## IAliasCommandLineActionOptions interface

Options for the AliasCommandLineAction constructor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IAliasCommandLineActionOptions 
```

string

The name of the alias. For example, if the tool is called "example", then the "build" alias might be invoked as: "example build -q --some-other-option"
